grassland restoration: The deliberate process of preserving and enhancing the unique ecological characteristics of fragmented and degraded remnants of subtropical grasslands, involving the integration of scientific understanding and conservation principles to promote the recovery and adaptation of native plant species, while mitigating the impacts of disturbance and invasion by non-native species.
